detail_desc: Trousers in a lightweight viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Trousers in a lightweight viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Trousers in a lightweight viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Short, one-shoulder dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise and a narrow, double shoulder strap. A-line with a flounce at the hem. Lined.
Metal rings in various designs.

Biker treggings in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and decorative seams at the knees. Wide jersey waist panel for best fit over the tummy.

Biker treggings in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and decorative seams at the knees. Wide jersey waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Short shorts in sturdy cotton jersey with a high, paper bag waist and zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt.
Short shorts in sturdy cotton jersey with a high, paper bag waist and zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt.
Metal rings in various designs. Four decorated with stone-look plastic beads.
Metal stud earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.3 cm to 1.5 cm.

Set with mittens and a hat in an organic cotton rib knit. Mittens with foldover ribbing at the top. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs. Hat with a pompom on top and ear flaps with ties under the chin. Jersey lining.

Set with mittens and a hat in an organic cotton rib knit. Mittens with foldover ribbing at the top. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs. Hat with a pompom on top and ear flaps with ties under the chin. Jersey lining.
Long, wide dress in an airy weave with button-top shoulder straps and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Long, wide dress in an airy weave with button-top shoulder straps and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Long metal earrings with plastic beads in various colours. Length 10 cm.
Multi-strand necklace in thin metal chain decorated with small round pendants and plastic beads. Adjustable length 40.5-48.5 cm.
Metal and plastic earrings in various designs, including two pairs of hoops and one pair of studs. Sizes from 1 cm to 4.5 cm.
Narrow metal hoop earrings with pendants. Diameter 1.2 cm-2.6 cm.
Narrow metal hoop earrings with pendants. Diameter 1.2 cm-2.6 cm.
Long earrings in metal with shells. Length 7 cm.
Metal studs and earrings in various designs and sizes. Size from 0.3 cm to 1.4 cm.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 1.2 cm to approx. 3 cm.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 1.2 cm to approx. 3 cm.

Set in soft organic cotton jersey. Two romper suits with off-centre press-studs down the front and along one leg, and full feet with elasticated heels. Two long-sleeved bodysuits with a wrapover front, and press-studs down the sides and at the crotch. One pair of trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist, a hat, and a pair of scratch mittens with no thumbs. The set is supplied in a drawstring bag.

Dungarees in soft, stretch denim with a pocket at the top, press-studs at the sides and elasticated straps with adjustable fastening at the front. Concealed press-studs at the crotch (except in sizes 1-4Y). Seam with belt loops at the waist, a fake fly and fake front and back pockets.
Short skirt in an airy, patterned cotton weave with a high waist and pleats to create width. Concealed zip in one side and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with shaping seams. Elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch, side pockets, back pockets and ribbed hems.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with shaping seams. Elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch, side pockets, back pockets and ribbed hems.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with shaping seams. Elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch, side pockets, back pockets and ribbed hems.
Metal and fabric bracelets in various designs. Adjustable length.
Metal and fabric bracelets in various designs. Adjustable length.

Off-the-shoulder jumpsuit in a pleated weave made partly from recycled polyester with elastication at the top and narrow ties that fasten at the back of the neck. Elasticated drawstring seam at the waist, pockets in the side seams and extra-wide, straight legs. Unlined.

Set with a fine-knit cardigan and a long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton with a bow tie. Cardigan with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs, button band and hem. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton with a fine-knit bodice and a collar and flared skirt in woven fabric. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton with a fine-knit bodice and a collar and flared skirt in woven fabric. Unlined.

Set with a shirt in a checked cotton weave and pair of trousers in stretch cotton corduroy. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Trousers with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and press-stud, and front and back pockets.

Set with a long-sleeved shirt, waistcoat, bow tie and pair of trousers. Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Waistcoat in a lightly brushed weave with buttons at the front and a back made from lining fabric. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back. Trousers in a lightly brushed weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and button, fake front pockets and a fake welt back pocket.

Set with a long-sleeved shirt, waistcoat, bow tie and pair of trousers. Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Waistcoat in a lightly brushed weave with buttons at the front and a back made from lining fabric. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back. Trousers in a lightly brushed weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and button, fake front pockets and a fake welt back pocket.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, flared legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, flared legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Wide dress woven in a viscose blend with a collar, V-neck, low dropped shoulders and buttoned cuffs. Straight-cut with tiers and a flare to the hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Trousers in soft, gently draping viscose twill with a high, elasticated waist and detachable tie belt. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Prolong the life of your favourite clothes. Mend, patch and continue to wear them. The patches can be ironed onto garments.

Trainers in cotton canvas with imitation leather details, a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles.

Pineapple-shaped metal earrings with faceted sparkly stones at the top. Length 5.5 cm.
Long, fruit-shaped metal earrings with faceted plastic stones. Length 6.5 cm.
Thin metal chain necklaces with various decorations, one in fabric with plastic beads. Adjustable length from 30-37 cm to 45-53 cm.
Metal chain bracelet with various decorations. Adjustable length 18-22.5 cm.
Multi-strand necklace covered in patterned plastic stones. Adjustable length 42-50 cm.
Narrow Alice band in fabric-covered metal with an appliqué in the shape of a glittery mistletoe sprig at the top.
Lightweight nylon coat with a filling of 70% recycled down and 30% recycled feathers. Front pockets and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Lined.

Fitted top in textured jersey with short cap sleeves, a wrapover at the top and a seam under the bust.
Sleeveless maxi dress in jersey and lace with a V-neck front and back, a concealed zip at the back and a seam at the waist. Lined at the top.
Swimsuit with a glittery pattern, narrow shoulder straps and a frill at the front. Lined at the front.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist, side pockets, detachable tie belt and tapered legs.
Rings in various designs. Two smooth and eight with various decorations.

Fitted body in patterned jersey with a deep, flounce-trimmed neckline at the front and narrow, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps that are elasticated at the back. Concealed press-studs at the crotch. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft fine knit with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
